OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Shadowheart pauses and reflects to herself after entering the main chamber of what was once an impressive temple dedicated to the moon goddess, Selune. Being a worshipper of Selune's rival, Shar, Shadowheart is satisfied to see the temple ruined and full of goblins, but also is curious as to what happened. She may suspect that fellow Sharrans were active in the region at some point in the past, and may have been responsible for the temple's desecration.
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: - Load Wild_Main_A- Recruit Shadowheart via debug book- Unchain Shadowheart from avatar- (As Shadowheart) goto -104, 458- Go through Heavy Oak Door to temple ruins(To initiate AOM path, make Shadoweart your avatar using debug book before going through door)

OM_ShadowHeart_COM.synopsis: Shadowheart, enters the inner area of the goblin camp - what was clearly once the central hall of a Temple dedicated to Selûne, the rival of Shadowheart's goddess, Shar. She notes that this must have once been a key area for Selûnite power and wonders what happened here. If she discovered earlier clues, she may believe Sharran allies destroyed this place long ago. The player may or may not be aware of Shadowheart's shar worshop at this point, and can attempt to pry the info from her.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_3.text: *A chill runs down your spine. Lady Shar's twin and nemesis, the moon goddess Selûne, was once worshipped here.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_15.text: *Yet this place clearly fell to ruins long before goblins infested it. Perhaps due to the Dark Justiciars you found signs of?*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_7.text: This could be the work of Shar's faithful. It would be wise to look for more signs.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_10.text: *You silently swear to be vigilant and dutiful in Shar's name.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_11.text: No matter who razed it, it's undeniable that this place must have been impressive once.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_8.text: Perhaps it is just a coincidence. But reason to praise Shar, all the same.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_5.text: *You silently offer a prayer to Shar and her glory.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_19.text: *Yet this place clearly fell to ruins long before goblins infested it. What happened here?*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_17.text: No matter. Rejoice in the desecration of this foul place.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_16.text: *You silently praise Shar for guiding whoever razed this Selûnite pit.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_2.text: Whatever happened, it's undeniable that this place must have been impressive once.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_14.text: *Selûne's followers can show great resolve, no matter how misguided it may be. You should not underestimate them.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_4.text: Someone razed this place - a foe of Selûne. Perhaps they can still be found.

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_6.text: *Or perhaps not, you think. Whoever struck this blow could be long dead themselves. But worth investigating, all the same.*

OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Narrator
OM_ShadowHeart_AOM_OOM_12.text: *No matter. The truth will be revealed in time.*

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_75.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_75.text: Selûne. As if mingling with a horde of goblins wasn't bad enough.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_20.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_20.text: Let's do what we have to, then get out of here.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_18.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_18.text: Not your usual haunt, I take it.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_76.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_76.text: Quite the understatement, but yes. Let's not linger in this place any more than necessary.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_7.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_7.text: Selûne is a bad omen - just look what's befallen her temple.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_73.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_73.text: No matter. I'll breathe easier once we're clear of this place.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_54.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_54.text: You seem to admire whoever left this place a ruin. Got something to say?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_50.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_50.text: Only that you're overthinking a simple deduction I made.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_50.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like this line of questioning, but trying to show it.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_66.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_66.text: You can trust me. I want to know what's concerning you.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_40.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_40.text: You're not going to let this go, are you? You might wish you had...
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_40.context: NodeContext: Coming around to telling the truth about herself.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_25.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_25.text: I worship Shar, the Mistress of the Night. It is my holy mission to oppose Selûne, her teachings and her followers.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_25.context: NodeContext: Not information she ever shares lightly.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_6.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_6.text: Don't make a fuss, Selûnite - we may be at odds, but I have more important concerns than you right now.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_22.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_22.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_81.speaker: Karlach
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_81.text: Fantastic. Monsters in our minds, and around our campfire.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_5.speaker: Astarion
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_5.text: Heavens forbid. We're all entitled to our secrets.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_29.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_29.text: I'll decide whether to make a fuss or not. Hard to trust someone who's holding out on me.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_46.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_46.text: Secrecy is everything for Shar's children. It's our code, our creed, our shield.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_72.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_72.text: I even keep secrets from myself - I had my memories suppressed, so that nothing I knew could be used against the Dark Lady. Once I prove myself, my memories will be restored.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_72.context: InternalNodeContext: This node only if the memory suppression beat wasn't established

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_69.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_69.text: I'm not sorry I kept this from you. Not one bit.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_62.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_62.text: Though perhaps that might change, if you can show an open mind.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_62.context: NodeContext: Conceding jus a little towards the player's hurt feelings - but conditionally

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_56.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_56.text: Let's see how open-minded I can be then: tell me more.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_14.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_14.text: Talk to me later. We've got more pressing matters to see to right now.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_48.text: It's been some time since I met another faithful of Shar. Are you versed in her teachings?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_43.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_43.text: Of course I am. But we can talk about this later - let's go.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_15.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_15.text: We can discuss this later. But let's just try a little more honesty going forward.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_52.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_52.text: All we can do is try, I suppose...

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_28.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_28.text: I don't know how I feel about this.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_74.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_74.text: Who says you have to feel anything?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_32.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_32.text: Gather your thoughts. Then perhaps we can talk some more.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_71.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_71.text: Thank you for telling me, at least.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_2.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_2.text: Don't thank me - I'm breaking Lady Shar's teachings just by doing so... but sometimes you have to be practical.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_2.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_77.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_77.text: I can't trust you. Best if we travel separately for now.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_12.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_12.text: If you insist. Don't expect to fare well without me to save you.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_57.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_57.text: Don't make a big fuss...? You've been lying to me!

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_37.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_37.text: A lie of omission at most. I'm sure you have some skeletons of your own hidden away.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_85.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_85.text: You could have told me. How long were you going to keep this secret?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_82.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_82.text: Forever, ideally. And you assume too much about what I can and cannot tell.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_24.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_24.text: I didn't agree to join up with a Shar worshipper.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_55.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_55.text: Then it's your own fault for not asking.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_59.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_59.text: Now that the truth's out, tell me more.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_16.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_16.text: In future, I expect you to be honest. Let's leave it at that for now.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_44.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_44.text: I don't care who you worship. We have bigger problems.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_58.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_58.text: True. I didn't think you'd react so pragmatically. Perhaps I should have told you sooner.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_11.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_11.text: Shar is an abomination. You deceived me.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_51.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_51.text: Your blindness as much as my deception, Selûnite. We can talk about this later - if you're willing.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_9.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_9.text: I bow to Shar also. The Dark Lady must favour us, to have brought us together.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_4.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_4.text: I... yes, she must. I'll offer thanks to her in my prayers - and we should speak more later. Alone, ideally.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_67.speaker: Wyll
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_67.text: A Shar worshipper? Not my usual quarry - nor my usual ally.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_10.speaker: Gale
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_10.text: You worship Shar? Blimey. She and my beloved Mystra are not exactly friends.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_36.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_36.text: Now that you have the truth, please don't make a big fuss about it.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_41.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_41.text: Is your hearing failing you? Or your wits perhaps? There's nothing more to say. Let's move.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_0.text: You're hiding something. Explain what's going on - now.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_79.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_79.text: Spare me your dramatics. I already told you all there is to tell. Let's go.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_31.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_31.text: You're far too eager to disrespect Selûne - what's going on?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_27.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_27.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like this line of questioning, but trying to show it.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_19.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_19.text: Selûne, a bad omen? Hardly. What's really the matter?

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_33.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_33.text: We don't have time for this. Besides, I already explained myself.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_33.context: NodeContext: Doesn't like this line of questioning, but trying to show it.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_42.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_42.text: Though I'll grant it must have been impressive once, in all its profane glory... until someone razed it.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glancing around the surroundings,NodeContext: Slight concession, glancing around an impressive temple

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_84.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_84.text: Though I'll grant it must have been impressive once, in all its profane glory... I wonder what happened.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_84.context: CinematicNodeContext: Glancing around the surroundings,NodeContext: Slight concession, glancing around an impressive temple

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_38.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_38.text: Show some respect. This is a sacred place for me... even in its current state.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_49.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_49.text: Respect's given freely. If your goddess needs to demand it, she's not worthy of it.
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_49.context: NodeContext: 'Don't tell me what to do'

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_83.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_83.text: Watch your tongue, Sharran. This is a sacred place for me... even in its current state.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_39.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_39.text: A ruin abandoned to a murderous horde is a very fitting dedication to Selûne.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_70.speaker: Player
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_70.text: You don't have to tell me twice.

OM_ShadowHeart_COM_68.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_ShadowHeart_COM_68.text: Good. Selûne is a bad omen - just look what's befallen her temple.
